doctype html
html
head
title
link(rel='stylesheet', href='/bootstrap-3.3.7-dist/css/bootstrap.min.css')
script(src='/javascripts/jquery-3.1.1.min.js')
script(src='/bootstrap-3.3.7-dist/js/bootstrap.min.js')
body(style='background: #dcd9da')
.container
  .row
    .col-md-4.col-md-offset-4
      .panel.panel-default(style='margin-top: 60px')
        .panel-heading(style='background: #0d6aad')
          h3(align='center', style='color: #ffffff;')
            | azkaban
        .panel-body(style='background: #e0e1ea')
          .form-group
            .input-group
              span.input-group-addon host
              input#host.form-control(type='text')
          .form-group
            .input-group
              span.input-group-addon port
              input#port.form-control(type='port')

          .form-group
            .input-group
              span.input-group-addon active
              input#active.form-control(type='text')
          .form-group
            button#register.btn.btn-success.btn-block(type='button')
              | log in
          #popup.alert.alert-warning
            a#close.close(href='#') ×
            div(align='center')
              strong#popup-content(style='color: #b12e30;')
script(type='text/javascript').
  $(document).ready(function () {
    var host = $("#host");
    var port = $("#port");
    var active = $("#active");
    var register = $("#register");
    var popup = $("#popup");
    var popupContent = $("#popup-content");
    var close = $("#close");
    popup.hide();
    close.click(function () {
      popup.hide();
    });
    register.click(function () {
      if (host.val() == "" || port.val() == "" || active.val() == "") {
        popup.show();
        popupContent.html("can't be empty");}  
      else {
        $.ajax({
          url: "/register/userRegister",
          data: {
            host: $("#host").val(),
            port: $("#port").val(),
            active: $("#active").val()
                },
          type: "POST",
          timeout: 36000,
          dataType: "text",
          success: function (data, textStatus) {
            var dataJson = eval("(" + data + ")");
            if (dataJson.code == 200) {
              alert("success");
            } else if (dataJson.code == 400) {
              popup.show();
              popupContent.html("fail,please retry");
            } else {
              popup.show();
              popupContent.html("error");
            }
          },
          error: function (XMLHttpRequest, textStatus, errorThrown) {
            alert("error:" + textStatus);
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
  • register.js 
var express = require('express');
var router = express.Router();

var mysql = require('mysql');
var config = require('../model/config');

var pool = mysql.createPool(config.mysql);
/* GET home page. */
router.get('/', function (req, res, next) {
  res.render('register', {title: 'register'});
});
router.post('/userRegister', function (req, res, next) {
  var host = req.body.host;
  var port = req.body.port;
  var active = req.body.active; 
  pool.getConnection(function (err, connection) {
var $sql1 = "INSERT INTO executors(id, host, port, active) VALUES(0,?,?,?)";
connection.query($sql1, [host, port, active], function (err, result) {
  console.log(result);
  if (result) {
result = {
  code: 200,
  msg: 'success'
};
  } else {
result = {
  code: 400,
  msg: 'fail'
};
  }
  res.json(result);
  connection.release();
});

});
  });
module.exports = router;
  • app.jsregister

  • model/config.js azkabanazkaban 

    module.exports = {
  mysql: {
host: '127.0.0.1',
user: 'azkaban',
password: '',
database: 'azkaban',
port: 3306
  }
};

  • npm starthttp://localhost:3000/register

1.document.domain + iframe ()

1www.a.com/a.html

document.domain = 'a.com';
var ifr = document.createElement('iframe');
ifr.src = 'http://www.script.a.com/b.html';
ifr.display = none;
document.body.appendChild(ifr);
ifr.onload = function(){
var doc = ifr.contentDocument || ifr.contentWindow.document;
//docb.html
ifr.onload = null;
};

2www.script.a.com/b.html

document.domain = 'a.com';

2.script

function loadScript(url, func) {
  var head = document.head || document.getElementByTagName('head')[0];
  var script = document.createElement('script');
  script.src = url;

  script.onload = script.onreadystatechange = function(){
if(!this.readyState || this.readyState=='loaded' || this.readyState=='complete'){
  func();
  script.onload = script.onreadystatechange = null;
}
  };

  head.insertBefore(script, 0);
}
window.baidu = {
  sug: function(data){
console.log(data);
  }
}
loadScript('http://suggestion.baidu.com/su?wd=w',function(){console.log('loaded')});
//
//chormesourcescript

ifr.src = 'http://www.cnblogs.com/lab/cscript/cs2.html#paramdo';
document.body.appendChild(ifr);
}

function checkHash() {
try {
var data = location.hash ? location.hash.substring(1) : '';
if (console.log) {
console.log('Now the data is '+data);
}
} catch(e) {};
}
setInterval(checkHash, 2000);

// iechromeparent.location.hash

4.window.name + iframe

window.name name name 2MB

  • 1a.com/cs1.html
  • 2a.com/proxy.html 
  <script>
  function proxy(url, func){
var isFirst = true,
ifr = document.createElement('iframe'),
loadFunc = function(){
  if(isFirst){
ifr.contentWindow.location = 'http://a.com/cs1.html';
isFirst = false;
  }else{
func(ifr.contentWindow.name);
ifr.contentWindow.close();
document.body.removeChild(ifr);
ifr.src = '';
ifr = null;
  }
};

ifr.src = url;
ifr.style.display = 'none';
if(ifr.attachEvent) ifr.attachEvent('onload', loadFunc);
else ifr.onload = loadFunc;

document.body.appendChild(iframe);
  }
</script>
</head>
<body>
  <script>
proxy('http://www.baidu.com/', function(data){
  console.log(data);
});
  </script>
</body>

4.window.name + iframe

window.name name name 2MB

  • 1a.com/cs1.html
  • 2a.com/proxy.html 
  <script>
  function proxy(url, func){
var isFirst = true,
ifr = document.createElement('iframe'),
loadFunc = function(){
  if(isFirst){
ifr.contentWindow.location = 'http://a.com/cs1.html';
isFirst = false;
  }else{
func(ifr.contentWindow.name);
ifr.contentWindow.close();
document.body.removeChild(ifr);
ifr.src = '';
ifr = null;
  }
};

ifr.src = url;
ifr.style.display = 'none';
if(ifr.attachEvent) ifr.attachEvent('onload', loadFunc);
else ifr.onload = loadFunc;

document.body.appendChild(iframe);
  }
</script>
</head>
<body>

proxy('http://www.baidu.com/', function(data){
  console.log(data);
});
  </script>

// 'http://c.com'postMessage
ifr.contentWindow.postMessage('I was there!', targetOrigin);
};
</script>

2)b.com/index.html 

<script type="text/javascript">
window.addEventListener('message', function(event){
// origin
if (event.origin == 'http://a.com') {
alert(event.data);// "I was there!"
alert(event.source);  // a.comindex.htmlwindow
  // event.sourcewindow
}
}, false);
</script>

function test(resolve, reject) {
    var timeOut = Math.random() * 2;
    log('set timeout to: ' + timeOut + ' seconds.');
    setTimeout(function () {
        if (timeOut < 1) {
            log('call resolve()...');
            resolve('200 OK');
        }
        else {
            log('call reject()...');
            reject('timeout in ' + timeOut + ' seconds.');
        }
    }, timeOut * 1000);
};
new Promise(test).then(function (result) {
    console.log('' + result);
}).catch(function (reason) {
    console.log('' + reason);
});

test(), resolve rejected . Promise ,,.

Promise12

URLPromise.race()

var p1 = new Promise(function (resolve, reject) {
    setTimeout(resolve, 500, 'P1');
});
var p2 = new Promise(function (resolve, reject) {
    setTimeout(resolve, 600, 'P2');
});
Promise.race([p1, p2]).then(function (result) {
    console.log(result); // 'P1'
});

p1Promisethen()P1p2

function getExplore(){
  var Sys = {};  
  var ua = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();  
  var s;  
  (s = ua.match(/rv:([\d.]+)\) like gecko/)) ? Sys.ie = s[1] :
  (s = ua.match(/msie ([\d\.]+)/)) ? Sys.ie = s[1] :  
  (s = ua.match(/edge\/([\d\.]+)/)) ? Sys.edge = s[1] :
  (s = ua.match(/firefox\/([\d\.]+)/)) ? Sys.firefox = s[1] :  
  (s = ua.match(/(?:opera|opr).([\d\.]+)/)) ? Sys.opera = s[1] :  
  (s = ua.match(/chrome\/([\d\.]+)/)) ? Sys.chrome = s[1] :  
  (s = ua.match(/version\/([\d\.]+).*safari/)) ? Sys.safari = s[1] : 0;  
  // 
  if (Sys.ie) return ('IE: ' + Sys.ie);  
  if (Sys.edge) return ('EDGE: ' + Sys.edge);
  if (Sys.firefox) return ('Firefox: ' + Sys.firefox);  
  if (Sys.chrome) return ('Chrome: ' + Sys.chrome);  
  if (Sys.opera) return ('Opera: ' + Sys.opera);  
  if (Sys.safari) return ('Safari: ' + Sys.safari);
  return 'Unkonwn';
}

,.

,:

function getExploreName(){
  var userAgent = navigator.userAgent;
  if(userAgent.indexOf("Opera") > -1 || userAgent.indexOf("OPR") > -1){
    return 'Opera';
  }else if(userAgent.indexOf("compatible") > -1 && userAgent.indexOf("MSIE") > -1){
    return 'IE';
  }else if(userAgent.indexOf("Edge") > -1){
    return 'Edge';
  }else if(userAgent.indexOf("Firefox") > -1){
    return 'Firefox';
  }else if(userAgent.indexOf("Safari") > -1 && userAgent.indexOf("Chrome") == -1){
    return 'Safari';
  }else if(userAgent.indexOf("Chrome") > -1 && userAgent.indexOf("Safari") > -1){
    return 'Chrome';
  }else if(!!window.ActiveXObject || "ActiveXObject" in window){
    return 'IE>=11';
  }else{
    return 'Unkonwn';
  }
}

alert("ie")

if(!+[1,])alert("ie"); 
else alert("ie");

# webpack?

webpack. webpack (dependency graph) bundle.
webpack :

  • (entry)
  • (output)
  • loader
  • (plugins)

, webpack4, mode , development production mode webpack .

##(entry point)

:entry: string|Array<string>
webpack.config.js :

const config = {
entry: './path/to/my/entry/file.js'
};

module.exports = config;

entry :

const config = {
entry: {
    main: './path/to/my/entry/file.js'
}
};

entry ,(multi-main entry).

:entry: {[entryChunkName: string]: string|Array<string>}
webpack.config.js:

const config = {
entry: {
    app: './src/app.js',
    vendors: './src/vendors.js'
}
};

(app)(vendor)

webpack.config.js :

const config = {
entry: {
    app: './src/app.js',
    vendors: './src/vendors.js'
}
};

webpack app.js vendors.js (dependency graph) bundle webpack (bootstrap) vendor(single page application)

webpack.config.js:

const config = {
entry: {
    pageOne: './src/pageOne/index.js',
    pageTwo: './src/pageTwo/index.js',
    pageThree: './src/pageThree/index.js'
}
};

webpack 3

(OUTPUT)

output webpack .,.

webpack output ,,:

  • filename ;
  • path .

webpack.config.js 

module.exports = {
output: {
    filename: 'bundle.js',
    path: '/home/proj/public/assets'
}
};

chunk,.
module.exports = {
entry: {
app: ./src/app.js,
search: ./src/search.js
},
output: {
filename: [name].js,
path: __dirname + /dist
}
};

// ./dist/app.js, ./dist/search.js

mode , webpack .

node :

    mode:'production'
}

cli :
webpack --mode=production
:

development

process.env.NODE_ENV development NamedChunksPlugin NamedModulesPlugin

production

process.env.NODE_ENV production FlagDependencyUsagePlugin, FlagIncludedChunksPlugin, ModuleConcatenationPlugin, NoEmitOnErrorsPlugin, OccurrenceOrderPlugin, SideEffectsFlagPlugin UglifyJsPlugin.

none

loader

loader .loader import . loader (tesk),.loader JavaScript.

loader webpack css , loader .

npm install ts-loader -D

    ]
}
};

loader

{

        modules: true
        }
    }
    ]
}
]

    };

nginx -s quitNginx nginx -s reload

Nginx nginx -s reload

Nginx URL URL Virtual Servers IP

location URI location

Nginx

; {} events, http, server location

events http server httplocationserver

#

: 

events {
    worker_connections  1024;
}
http {
    include       mime.types;
    default_type  application/octet-stream;
    sendfile        on;
    keepalive_timeout  65;
    server {
        listen       80;
        server_name  localhost;
        location ~ .*\.(flv|mp3|mp4|ts)$ {
            add_header Content-Disposition "attachment; filename=$request_filename";
            root /replay/;
            }
        location / {
            root   web/html/live;
            index  index.html;
            }
        location /wap {
            alias   /web/wap;
            index  index.html;
        }    
        error_page   500 502 503 504  /50x.html;
        location = /50x.html {
            root   html;
        }
    }

Web HTMLNginx /data/www html /data/imageshttpserverlocation

/data/www index.html /data/images

    root /data;
}

/images//

server 

server {
    location / {
        root /data/www;
    }

    location /images/ {
        root /data;
    }
}

80 http://localhost/ /images/ /data/images http://localhost/images/example.png nginx /data/images/example.png nginx 404URI /images/ /data/www http://localhost/some/example.html nginx /data/www/some/example.html

Post.title: nodejs FTP
Post.content:
nodejs ftp 

var Client = require('ftp');
//ftp 
var fs = require('fs');

var c = new Client();
var connectionProperties = {
host: "47.89.193.183,
//21
user: "test",
password: "test"
};
//

//foo.txtfoo.remote-copy.txt

c.on('ready', function() {
c.put('foo.txt', 'foo.remote-copy.txt', function(err) {
    if (err) throw err;
    console.dir("");
    c.end();
});
});

c.connect(connectionProperties);

ftp 

const file = ctx.request.files.file;
//
const reader = fs.createReadStream(file.path);
const ext = file.name.split(".").pop();
const dir = path.join(__dirname, `../upload/${utils.getDirName()}`);
utils.checkDirExist(dir);
let fileName = `${utils.getDirName()}_${~~(Math.random() * 10000)}.${ext}`;
const fileLocation = `${dir}/${fileName}`;
//
const upStream = fs.createWriteStream(fileLocation);
//
reader.pipe(upStream);
utils.transferFile(fileLocation, `/yunjia/${fileName}`);

//
transferFile(fileLocation, path) {
let ftpClient = new FtpClient();
ftpClient.on("ready", function() {
  ftpClient.put(fileLocation, path, function(err) {
    if (err) throw err;
    console.dir("");
    ftpClient.end();
    fs.unlinkSync(fileLocation);
  });
});
ftpClient.connect(ftpConnectionConfig.ftpConnectionConfig);

}

const file = ctx.request.files.file;
//
const reader = fs.createReadStream(file.path);
const ext = file.name.split(".").pop();
const dir = path.join(__dirname, `../upload/${utils.getDirName()}`);
utils.checkDirExist(dir);
let fileName = `${utils.getDirName()}_${~~(Math.random() * 10000)}.${ext}`;
const fileLocation = `${dir}/${fileName}`;
//
const upStream = fs.createWriteStream(fileLocation);
//
reader.pipe(upStream);
utils.transferFile(fileLocation, `/yunjia/${fileName}`);

//
transferFile(fileLocation, path) {
let ftpClient = new FtpClient();
ftpClient.on("ready", function() {
  ftpClient.put(fileLocation, path, function(err) {
    if (err) throw err;
    console.dir("");
    ftpClient.end();
    fs.unlinkSync(fileLocation);
  });
});
ftpClient.connect(ftpConnectionConfig.ftpConnectionConfig);

}

Post.title: nvm node
Post._content:
> NodeJS nvm nvm  Mac  node  Ruby  rvm Windows  node nvmw  nvm-windowsnvm-windows  nvm  nvm-windows 

 nvm  node , `sudo `.

# 
##  node  modules
 Finder shift+command+G node  node_modules :

 /usr/local/lib node  node_modules 
 /usr/local/include node  node_modules 
 brew install node  NodeJS brew uninstall node 
 locallib  include  node  node_modules 
 /usr/local/bin  node 



    sudo rm /usr/local/bin/npm
    sudo rm /usr/local/share/man/man1/node.1
    sudo rm /usr/local/lib/dtrace/node.d
    sudo rm -rf ~/.npm
    sudo rm -rf ~/.node-gyp
    sudo rm /opt/local/bin/node
    sudo rm /opt/local/include/node
    sudo rm -rf /opt/local/lib/node_modules

##  nvm

 nvm [](https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm), homebrew .

    // curl
    curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.34.0/install.sh | bash
    //Wget
    wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.34.0/install.sh | bash

## 

`nvm`,,shell . shell  zsh, `~/.zshrc`, bash  `~/.bash_profile`, `source ~/.zshrc source ~/.bash_profile`,terminal.

    export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm"
    [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh"  # This loads nvm
    [ -s "$NVM_DIR/bash_completion" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/bash_completion"  # This loads nvm bash_completion

 nvm,:

    Node Version Manager

    Usage:
        nvm help                    Show this message
        nvm --version               Print out the latest released version of nvm
        nvm install [-s] <version>  Download and install a <version>, [-s] from source
        nvm uninstall <version>     Uninstall a version
        nvm use <version>           Modify PATH to use <version>
        nvm run <version> [<args>]  Run <version> with <args> as arguments
        nvm current                 Display currently activated version
        nvm ls                      List installed versions
        nvm ls <version>            List versions matching a given description
        nvm ls-remote               List remote versions available for install
        nvm deactivate              Undo effects of NVM on current shell
        nvm alias [<pattern>]       Show all aliases beginning with <pattern>
        nvm alias <name> <version>  Set an alias named <name> pointing to <version>
        nvm unalias <name>          Deletes the alias named <name>
        nvm copy-packages <version> Install global NPM packages contained in <version> to current version

    Example:
        nvm install v0.10.24        Install a specific version number
        nvm use 0.10                Use the latest available 0.10.x release
        nvm run 0.10.24 myApp.js    Run myApp.js using node v0.10.24
        nvm alias default 0.10.24   Set default node version on a shell

    Note:
        to remove, delete or uninstall nvm - just remove ~/.nvm, ~/.npm and ~/.bower folders


## nvm

    nvm ls-remote //

    nvm install <version> //nvm install v8.14.0


    nmv install stable //

    nvm uninstall <version> //

    nvm ls //

    nvm use <version> //

    nvm current //

    nvm alias default <version> //node(, node )


##  npm 
,npm (https://registry.npmjs.org/),, cnpm.
### 
1.
`npm --registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org install express`
2.
`npm config set registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org`
3.cnpm
`npm install -g cnpm --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org`

`npm config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org/`
npm
`npm config get registry`

nvm,:

Node Version Manager

Usage:
    nvm help                    Show this message
    nvm --version               Print out the latest released version of nvm
    nvm install [-s] <version>  Download and install a <version>, [-s] from source
    nvm uninstall <version>     Uninstall a version
    nvm use <version>           Modify PATH to use <version>
    nvm run <version> [<args>]  Run <version> with <args> as arguments
    nvm current                 Display currently activated version
    nvm ls                      List installed versions
    nvm ls <version>            List versions matching a given description
    nvm ls-remote               List remote versions available for install
    nvm deactivate              Undo effects of NVM on current shell
    nvm alias [<pattern>]       Show all aliases beginning with <pattern>
    nvm alias <name> <version>  Set an alias named <name> pointing to <version>
    nvm unalias <name>          Deletes the alias named <name>
    nvm copy-packages <version> Install global NPM packages contained in <version> to current version

Example:
    nvm install v0.10.24        Install a specific version number
    nvm use 0.10                Use the latest available 0.10.x release
    nvm run 0.10.24 myApp.js    Run myApp.js using node v0.10.24
    nvm alias default 0.10.24   Set default node version on a shell

Note:
    to remove, delete or uninstall nvm - just remove ~/.nvm, ~/.npm and ~/.bower folders

Post.title: arraybuffer
Post.content:
The ArrayBuffer is a data type that is used to represent a generic, fixed-length binary data buffer. You cant directly manipulate the contents of an ArrayBuffer; instead, you create an ArrayBufferView object which represents the buffer in a specific format, and use that to read and write the contents of the buffer.

Post.raw:
---
title:  vue  postcss-px-to-viewport
tags: []
categories: 
---

 vue , postcss-px-to-viewport  px  viewport

## 

```sh
npm install postcss-loader postcss-px-to-viewport --save-dev

```

##  vue.config.js 

```js
css: {
  loaderOptions: {
    postcss: {
      plugins: [
        require("postcss-px-to-viewport")({
      unitToConvert: 'px', //"px"
      viewportWidth: 375, // 
      viewportHeight: 1334,//375667
      unitPrecision: 13, // `px`
      propList: ['*'], // vw
      viewportUnit: 'vw', // vw
      fontViewportUnit: 'vw', //
      selectorBlackList: ['.ignore-', '.hairlines'], //,
      minPixelValue: 1, // `1px`
      mediaQuery: false, // `px`
      replace: true, //
      exclude: [
        /RightBar/,
        /gotop.vue/,
      ], // 'node_modules' 
      landscape: false, // landscapeWidth  @media (orientation: landscape)
      landscapeUnit: 'vw', //
      landscapeWidth: 1134 //


        })
      ];
    }
  }
}
```

# 1

- ssh 
- (ds218+)

# 2 /

,,,,.

# 3.ssl /

[https://github.com/andyzhshg/syno-acme](https://github.com/andyzhshg/syno-acme),[http://www.up4dev.com/2018/05/29/synology-ssl-wildcard-cert-update/](http://www.up4dev.com/2018/05/29/synology-ssl-wildcard-cert-update/)
,,, dns  api key  screct  dns , ttl  ttl .,.

# 4.

 frp [https://h123.cf/2019/09/12/2019.09.12.frp/#more](https://h123.cf/2019/09/12/2019.09.12.frp/#more)
 frp  https 

:
[https://github.com/fatedier/frp/blob/master/README_zh.md](https://github.com/fatedier/frp/blob/master/README_zh.md)

## 

###  frpc.ini

```ini
; frpc.ini
[common]
; frps  ip
server_addr = xxxx
; frps 
server_port = 7000

#[http_ip]
#type = http
#local_port = 5000
#custom_domains = 

[https_ip]
type = https
custom_domains = 
plugin = https2http
plugin_local_addr = 127.0.0.1:5000

# HTTPS 
plugin_crt_path =  crt 
plugin_key_path = key 
plugin_host_header_rewrite = 127.0.0.1
plugin_header_X-From-Where = frp
```

### 

 cer , crt :

```bash
openssl x509 -inform PEM -in certificate.cer -out certificate.crt

```

## 

###  frps.ini

```ini
; frps.ini
 [common]
    bind_port = 7000
    ; vhost_https_port https 
    vhost_https_port = 443
    dashboard_port = 7500
```

###  nginx
 nginx  80  443 , https

```ini
; nginx.conf
server {
    listen 80;
    server_name www.test.com;
    rewrite ^(.*)$ https://${server_name}$1 permanent; 
}
```


##  tips
frpc/frps :
```bash
nohup ./frps -c ./frps.ini &



nohup ./frpc -c ./frpc.ini &


```
 `nohup.out` ,.

, kill ,.

```bash

ps -ef | grep frpc | grep -v grep | cut -c 9-15 | xargs kill -s 9

#  frpc ...
```

Post.title: ES6
Post.content:
`string text`

`string text line 1
 string text line 2`

`string text ${expression} string text`

tag `string text ${expression} string text`

(` `) ${expression}`\

\ === " // --> true

:

console.log('string text line 1\n' +
'string text line 2');
// "string text line 1
// string text line 2"

console.log(`string text line 1
string text line 2`);
// "string text line 1
// string text line 2"

:

var a = 5;
var b = 10;
console.log('Fifteen is ' + (a + b) + ' and\nnot ' + (2 * a + b) + '.');
// "Fifteen is 15 and
// not 20."

var a = 5;
var b = 10;
console.log(`Fifteen is ${a + b} and
not ${2 * a + b}.`);
// "Fifteen is 15 and
// not 20."


'use strict';
var a = 1;
console.log(a); //1
console.log(`a=${a}`); //a=1
console.log('a=${a}'); // a=${a}

test ? expression1 : expression2

  • test: Boolean ;
  • expression1 : test true ,,;
  • expression2: test false ,,.

?: ifelse.. ,:

var now = new Date();
var greeting = "Good" + ((now.getHours() > 17) ? " evening." : " day.");

ifelse: 

var now = new Date();
var greeting = "Good";
if (now.getHours() > 17)
   greeting += " evening.";
else
   greeting += " day.";

var/let/const

  • const ,;
  • let ,,;
  • var ,,.

for(var i=0;i<=2;i++){
    var a = i;
}
console.log(a); //2

for(var i=0;i<=2;i++){
    let a = i;
}
console.log(a); //undefined

for(var i=0;i<=2;i++){
    const a = i;
}
console.log(a); //undefined

const a = 1;
a = 2 ;
console.log(a); //Assignment to constant variable. 

const a = {b:1};
a.b = 2;
console.log(a.b); // 2

=>

(parameters) => { statements }

:

() => { statements }

,:

parameters => { statements }

,:

parameters => expression

:

function (parameters){
return expression;
}

findIndex()

findIndex()-1
:

let arr = [
            {id:1,value:2},
            {id:2,value:3},
            .......
        ]

id=8,:
arr.splice(arr.findIndex(item => item.id === 8), 1)
